Package ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsoleGame
    For playing the game in the console.
    GameMain
    Main class for the GUI for a 2048 game.
    GamePanel
    User interface for the main grid
    NormalizedMove
    A NormalizedMove is a description of a tile move in the game described in terms of actual row and column positions.
    Position
    Encapsulates a row and column.
    ScorePanel
    Panel for displaying the score in a simple video game.
    Tile
    Represents a position and value on a grid that can be animated from an old position to a new position.
